uk.ac.aber.dcs.cs12420.aberpizza.data

Class XML

  • java.lang.Object
    • uk.ac.aber.dcs.cs12420.aberpizza.data.XML

  • public class XML
extends java.lang.Object
    Exports/imports entire Till object including array list of Order objects to/from an XML file.
    Author:
    Connor Goddard (clg11)

    • Constructor Summary

      Reads/loads Till data from XML file to new Till object using selected file path.

        public XML()

    • Method Detail

      • saveTill

        public void saveTill(Till till,
            java.lang.String pathName)
        Exports the entire Till object (taken as a parameter) to XML before saving it to the file system.
        Parameters:
        till - The Till object that is to be exported to XML.
        pathName - The destination path name of the exported XML file.

      • loadTill

        public Till loadTill(java.lang.String pathName)
              throws java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException,
                     java.util.NoSuchElementException
        Reads/loads Till data from XML file to new Till object using selected file path. If XML file cannot be parsed, returns a new Till object instead.
        Parameters:
        pathName - The specified source file path
        Returns:
        New Till object (either from XML file or new)
        Throws:
        java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException - Could not access the Order array list (Data not acceptable) - Caught by GUI
        java.util.NoSuchElementException - Could not find any Till object (Data not acceptable) - Caught by GUI
